mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TP_REGDT,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') TP_REGDT , DECODE(TP_HAESEOL_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_HAESEOL_YN , DECODE(TP_COURSE_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_COURSE_YN , DECODE(TP_PICUP_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_PICUP_YN , TP.*, CS.SC_CODENM , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB WHERE TP.TP_KEYNO = TPS_TP_KEYNO) CHILDCNT FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM TP LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TP_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}
SELECT TPS.*, CS.SC_CODENM FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB TPS LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TPS.TPS_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TPS_TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TP_REGDT,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') TP_REGDT , DECODE(TP_HAESEOL_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_HAESEOL_YN , DECODE(TP_COURSE_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_COURSE_YN , DECODE(TP_PICUP_YN,'Y','필요','불필요') TP_PICUP_YN , TP.* , CS.SC_CODENM , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB WHERE TP.TP_KEYNO = TPS_TP_KEYNO) CHILDCNT FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM TP LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TP_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TP_NAME = #{TP_NAME} AND TP_PHONE1 = #{TP_PHONE1} AND TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT NVL(TPS_NAME,' ') TPS_NAME, NVL(TPS_PHONE,' ') TPS_PHONE, CS.SC_CODENM FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM_SUB TPS LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON TPS_DIVISION = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE TPS_TP_KEYNO = #{TP_KEYNO}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM WHERE TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N' )

SELECT TO_CHAR(C.TP_REGDT,'YYYY-MM-dd') TP_REGDT , SUBSTR(C.TP_NAME,1,1) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(C.TP_NAME)-1,'*') TP_NAME , LPAD('*',3,'*') || '-' || LPAD('*',4,'*') || '-' || LPAD('*',1,'*') || SUBSTR(C.TP_PHONE1,-3) TP_PHONE1 , C.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.TP_REGDT) RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM T_TOURISM_PROGRAM WHERE TP_TYPE = #{TP_TYPE} AND TP_DELYN = 'N' ) A ORDER BY RNUM DESC ) B ) C
WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}
